ghq.question: Been feeling perfectly well and in good health?
Been feeling in need of a good topic?
Been feeling run down and out of sorts?
Felt that you are ill?
Been getting any pains in your head?
Been getting a feeling of tightness or pressure in your head?
Been having hot or cold spells?
Lost much sleep over worry?
Had difficulty in staying asleep once you are off?
Felt constantly under strain?
Been getting edgy and bad-tempered?
Been getting scared or panicky for no good reason?
Found everything getting on top of you?
Been feeling nervous and strung-up all the time?
Been managing to keep yourself busy and occupied?
Been taking longer over the things you do?
Felt on the whole you were doing things well?
Been satisfied with the way you’ve carried out your task?
Felt that you are playing a useful part in things?
Felt capable of making decisions about things?
Been able to enjoy your normal day-to-day activities?
Been thinking of yourself as a worthless person?
Felt that life is entirely hopeless?
Felt that life isn’t worth living?
Thought of the possibility that you might make away with yourself?
Found at times you couldn’t do anything because your nerves were too bad?
Found yourself wishing you were dead and away from it all?
Found that the idea of taking your own life kept coming into your mind?

sass.question: How interested are you in your occupation?
How interested are you in your home-related activities?
Do you pursue this occupation, these activities with:
Are you interested in hobbies/leisure?
Is the quality of your spare time:
How frequently do you seek contacts with your family members (spouse, children, parents, etc.)?
Is the state of relations in your family:
Outside of your family, do you have relationships with:
Do you try to form relationships with others:
How — in general — do you rate your relationships with other people?
What value to you attach to your relationships with others?
How often do people in your social circle seek contact with you?
Do you observe the social rules, good manner, politeness, etc.
To what extent are you involved in community life (such as club, church, etc.)
Do you like searching for information about things, situations and people to improve your understanding of them?
Are you interested in scientific, technical or cultural information?
How often do you find it difficult to express your opinions to people?
How often do you feel rejected, excluded from your circle?
How important do you consider your physical appearance?
To what extent do you have difficulties in managing your resources and income?
Do you feel able to organise your environment according to your wishes and needs?

bdi.question: Sadness
options: C. 2 — I am always sad and can't control it
D. 3 — I am too sad or unhappy to tolerate

bdi.question: Pessimism
options: A. 0 — I don't feel disappointed about the future
B. 1 — I feel disappointed about the future
C. 2 — I feel there is no hope for the future
D. 3 — I feel the future has no hope and can't get better

bdi.question: Past failures
options: A. 0 — I don't feel like I have failed
B. 1 — I feel I have failed more than others
C. 2 — Looking back, I can see many failures
D. 3 — I feel I am a complete failure

bdi.question: Loss of pleasure
options: A. 0 — I get the same pleasure from activities as before
B. 1 — I no longer get pleasure from activities as before
C. 2 — I rarely get pleasure from things I truly like
D. 3 — I can't feel any pleasure from anything

bdi.question: Guilt
options: B. 1 — I feel slight guilt about what I have done or not done
C. 2 — I feel very guilty about what I have done or not done
D. 3 — I feel guilty all the time and can't get rid of it

bdi.question: Sense of punishment
options: A. 0 — I don't feel like I'm being punished
B. 1 — I feel I might be punished
C. 2 — I expect to be punished
D. 3 — I feel I'm being punished

bdi.question: Self-loathing
options: A. 0 — I don't feel disappointed in myself
B. 1 — I feel disappointed in myself

bdi.question: Self-criticism
options: A. 0 — I don't feel I'm worse than others
B. 1 — I criticize myself for my weaknesses or mistakes
C. 2 — I always blame myself for my mistakes
D. 3 — I blame myself for everything bad that happens

bdi.question: Suicidal thoughts
options: A. 0 — I don't have suicidal thoughts
B. 1 — I have suicidal thoughts, but won't act on them
C. 2 — I really want to commit suicide
D. 3 — I would commit suicide if I had the chance

bdi.question: Crying
options: A. 0 — I don't feel like crying more than before
B. 1 — I cry more easily than before
C. 2 — I always feel like crying now
D. 3 — I used to cry, but now I can't cry even if I want to

bdi.question: Irritability
options: A. 0 — I don't get more easily angry than usual
B. 1 — I get a bit more angry than before
C. 2 — I often feel annoyed or irritable
D. 3 — I am always in an irritable state now

bdi.question: Social withdrawal
options: A. 0 — I haven't lost interest in others
B. 1 — I have less interest in others than before
C. 2 — I have lost most of my interest in others
D. 3 — I have completely lost interest in others

bdi.question: Hesitation
options: A. 0 — I can make decisions as before
B. 1 — I find it harder to make decisions than before
C. 2 — I find it very hard to make any decisions
D. 3 — I can't make any decisions at all

bdi.question: Self-image
options: A. 0 — I don't feel I look worse than before
B. 1 — I worry about looking old or unattractive
C. 2 — I feel my appearance has permanently changed, making me unattractive
D. 3 — I believe I look very ugly

bdi.question: Work difficulties
options: A. 0 — I can work as before
B. 1 — I need extra effort to start work
C. 2 — I must force myself to complete simple tasks
D. 3 — I can't work at all

bdi.question: Sleep problems
options: A. 0 — My sleep is as good as before
B. 1 — My sleep is not as deep or as long as before
C. 2 — I wake up 1-2 hours earlier than usual and have difficulty falling back asleep
D. 3 — I wake up several hours earlier than usual and can't fall back asleep

bdi.question: Fatigue
options: A. 0 — I don't feel more fatigued than usual
B. 1 — I feel more fatigued than before
C. 2 — Almost anything makes me feel fatigued
D. 3 — I'm too fatigued to do even simple things

bdi.question: Appetite changes
options: A. 0 — My appetite hasn't changed much
B. 1 — My appetite is slightly worse or better than before
C. 2 — My appetite is very poor or I overeat significantly
D. 3 — I have no appetite at all or can't stop eating

bdi.question: Weight changes
options: A. 0 — My weight hasn't changed much
B. 1 — My weight has decreased or increased by more than 5%
C. 2 — My weight has decreased or increased by more than 10%
D. 3 — My weight has decreased or increased by more than 15%

bdi.question: Health concerns
options: A. 0 — My concerns about health aren't more than before
B. 1 — I worry about physical pain, stomach discomfort, or constipation
C. 2 — I am very worried about my physical problems and can't think of anything else
D. 3 — I am completely preoccupied with physical discomfort and can't think of anything else

bdi.question: Sexual desire changes
options: A. 0 — My interest in sex is the same as before
B. 1 — My interest in sex has decreased compared to before
C. 2 — I have almost no interest in sex now
D. 3 — I have completely lost interest in sex
